mapper.select: select srf.*, sf.function_code, sf.function_type, sf.function_description, sf.function_icon, sf.function_sequence, sf.function_name, sf.module_code, sf.parent_function_id, sf.resource_name, sf.resource_id from sys_user_function srf join sys_function sf on sf.function_id=srf.function_id join sys_user su on su.user_id=srf.user_id WHERE su.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
